import { Typography } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' function Mark({title, type, text, children, bold, italicized, underlined, variableType, color, clauseCounter}) { const getChildren = () => children.map((child) => { const isBold = child.bold || bold const isItalicized = child.italicized || italicized const isUnderlined = child.underlined || underlined const isList = type === "ul" || type === "ol" const childJsx = if (isList) return
  • {childJsx}
    • else return childJsx }) const getTypeWrapper = () => { switch(type) { case "block": return (children) =>
    {children}
    case "p": return (children) =>

    {children}

    case "h1": return (children) =>

    {children}

    case "h2": return (children) =>

    {children}

    case "h3": return (children) =>

    {children}

    case "h4": return (children) =>

    {children}

    case "h5": return (children) =>
    {children}
    case "h6": return (children) =>
    {children}
    case "ul": return (children) =>
      {children}
    case "ol": return (children) =>
      {children}
    case "span": return (children) => {children} case "clause": const current = clauseCounter.current clauseCounter.current += 1 return (children) =>
    {current}. {children}
    default: return (children) => {children} } } if(text) return {text} else return ( getTypeWrapper()(getChildren()) ) } export default Mark
